New Records: Brooks Lee snapped an 0-for-19 streak with a go-ahead, two-run double; Matt Wallner homered for the second straight game; Nolan Schanuel had his 13th homer of the season; Jordyn Adams added his first career homer
Key Match Events: Royce Lewis nearly had his sixth career grand slam but it was called back; Matt Wallner's homer tied the game; Brooks Lee's double broke a streak and gave the Twins the lead; Willi Castro had an RBI single to snap an 0-for-16 skid; the Twins won the game 6-4
Pre-Game Insights: The Twins were looking to snap a six-game losing streak; the Angels had lost four of their previous five games
Post-Match Reflections: Minnesota manager Rocco Baldelli noted the good swings and energy from the team; Jordyn Adams reflected on his first career homer
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins remain in playoff contention; the Angels have struggles recently; several players were injured or returning from the injured list
